abstract: As stocks climbed on Monday, a leading stock index crossed a milestone that seemed unthinkable during the worst declines of the bear market: It turned positive for the year.
snippet: As stocks climbed on Monday, a leading stock index crossed a milestone that seemed unthinkable during the worst declines of the bear market: It turned positive for the year.
lead_paragraph: For many investors, breaking even never felt so good.

headline.main: S.&P. 500 Erases 2009 Losses as Stocks Jump
headline.print_headline: Benchmark S.& P. 500 Recovers 2009 Losses as Stocks Jump
